metadata.title: Kuroseha Scottish Clan Keith Tartan Plaid Scarf Women Soft Cashmere Scarves Large Warm Blanket Winter Shawl
features: Super Soft Imitation Cashmere, The Best Quality, Soft And Close To The Skin, Hairy, Comfortable, Light, Warm, Close To The Skin.

The Poncho Shawl Adopts A Unique And Fashionable Design, Which Falls Beautifully On Your Upper Body, Keeping You Warm All Day Long. It Can Be Worn On Jackets, Sweaters Or Suits In Any Cool Season. The Long Fashionable Scarf Will Make You Feel Comfortable And Warm. The Cold Winter Night Is The Style, Elegant And Fashionable, And Any Clothing.
Unique Patterns And Colors To Meet Your Daily Wear. Match Your Jacket, Coat, Suit, Etc., Very Suitable For Spring, Autumn And Winter, And Can Be Used As A Holiday Gift For Friends And Lovers.
77 Inches * 27 Inches. Soft Texture, Medium Weight, Subtle Gloss. Well Decorated. Roll Up And Easily Put It In Your Bag.
Hand Wash, Quick-Drying, Easy To Care, Durable, Do Not Use Bleach.
description: Trendy Tartan Scarf-Trendy Tartan Scarf Will Never Go Out Of Style. The Colors Are Matched Or Opposite, Reflecting Your Unique Charm. The Best Gift For Her-It Would Be A Very Good Choice To Give This Scarf As A Warm Gift To Your Friends Or Family. A Scarf Will Bring You A Lot Of Fun, Right Here.
